entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Re-enable Run_WithHotReloadEnabled_DoesNotReadConsoleIn_InNonInteractiveMode #29047
  • Re-enable Microsoft.DotNet.Watcher.Tools.NoDepsAppTests.RestartProcessThatTerminatesAfterFileChange #29046

PullRequests

Created

  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29041
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29040
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29039
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • Simplify output testing #28994
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Deps.json should include project references that aren't present in project.assets.json #28963
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Migrate the nuget state from earlier SDKs #29036
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure
  • Retarget Microsoft.Extensions.DotNetDeltaApplier to netstandard2.1 #28984
    Servicing-approved, Area-Watch
